alert.note: Alert for Colorado Springs Vicinity, Southern El Paso County, Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft; Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 04 at 7:23PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Strong outflow winds from the scattered showers and isolated thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern El Paso and northeastern Pueblo Counties through 800 PM MDT... At 723 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking outflow winds along a line extending from near Ellicott to near Pinon to 6 miles north of Blende. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Southeastern Colorado Springs, Pueblo, Fountain, Hanover, Yoder, Ellicott, Schriever AFB, Pueblo Depot, Pinon, Security, Security-Widefield, Pueblo West, Peterson AFB, Truckton, Salt Creek, Cimarron Hills and Fort Carson. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Colorado Springs Vicinity, Southern El Paso County, Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft; Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet
